channel.title: happy to be wrong on treacherous.tech
channel.description: Recent content in happy to be wrong on treacherous.tech

item.title: Stop painting rainbows
item.description: There's a tendency in talks and really solid books outlining real systemic problems to tack on a sort of ‘now, here's the good news’ final chapter or post-script. Mostly, these undermine all the points that preceded it.
